```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Let's visualize a spectrum in base R

```{r}
sample_spectrum <- read.csv("https://metabolomics-usi.gnps2.org/csv/?usi1=mzspec%3AGNPS%3AGNPS-LIBRARY%3Aaccession%3ACCMSLIB00004679205")
plot(sample_spectrum, type="p")
```


# This is a webR-enabled code cell in a Quarto HTML document.

```{webr-r}
fit = lm(mpg ~ am, data = mtcars)

summary(fit)
```
